props.disabled: Puts all children inputs into a disabled state.
props.collapseIcon: Icon to display when the list item is expanded.
props.expandIcon: Icon to display when the list item is collapsed.
props.group: Assign a route namespace. Accepts a string or regexp for determining active state.
props.noAction: Removes left padding assigned for action icons from group items.
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`.
props.subgroup: Designate the component as nested list group.
props.fluid: Removes the left padding assigned for action icons from group items.

exposed.isOpen: Returns the current state of the list-group.
